channel.title: How can i Make a "ITEM" teleport a person using a option above it

item.title: How can i Make a "ITEM" teleport a person using a option above it
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

also isnt working:

case 1856:
deleteItem(1856,1);
sM(“You throw the teletab on ground…”);
setAnimation(827);
specGFX(580);
toX = 3213;
toY = 3424;
break;

item.title: How can i Make a "ITEM" teleport a person using a option above it
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

i have a teleport tab or some sort that has the option “teleport” above use and drop. i want to beable to click on the teleport option and teleport to certain cords. how is this possible to do? also the server is a 317 DeltaBase.

VIDEO OF WHAT I WANT TO HAPPEN: http://s600.photobucket.com/albums/tt81/omgmike1/?action=view&current=Untitled-1.flv

PAST CODES THAT DIDNT WORK:

if(ItemID == 1856){
deleteItem(1856, 1);
toY = 3333;
toX = 3333;
sM(“You teleport to Home”);
setAnimation(1854);
lowGFX(565,0);
}
(didnt work cause it only tele’s when i drop the item then try to pick it up then it teleports me!!)

NOTE: if some one can give me a working code i’ll gadly give u the tab model! and int!

Read full topic
item.source: How can i Make a "ITEM" teleport a person using a option above it
